description:
UPDATE 12-4-2016: made some new lectures about How to Mind Map a Book!

My brain is working much, much better since I became a professional Mind Mapper.
My goal in this training is to unlock the full potential of your brain too!

This Course will cover the most important aspects of MindMapping so you can start improving your brain right away!

  • Why does Mind Mapping work
  • How can you draw a Mind Map on paper
  • Which software is available for MindMapping
  • Use MindMaps on several devices and synchronize them
  • How to use MindMaps for planning, brainstorming and note-taking
  • MindMaps for Learning saves time and makes it more fun
  • Become 20-30% more productive with Mind Maps

And more, much more!

I made this training, in Dutch, and thousands of people followed it and are very satisfied with my training. I am exited that now you, wherever you are living on our planet, can follow this training too!

I would say: Enroll and start using MindMaps on the most effective way!
title: MindMapping: unlock the full potential of your brain!
